reviewText: great yoga breathing and exercises and the voice  and comments of Dr. Lam  is relaxing and helpful I highly recommend it!

I love Dr. Lam's work. He's truly helped a great deal with understanding and treating my adrenal fatigue. His voice is very soothing, the breathing exercises relaxing and simple, and in time, the yoga will help my ailing posture. I'm very grateful for Dr. Lam and his website.
